column3: Latest; Japan: A Dr. Kyuse Enshinjoh
column4: Supreme Advisor to ------Buddhist------ Summit and Founder Priest of ------Nenbutsushu------organised a ceremony for the late Princess Bopha Devi in the ------Royal Grand Hall------ temple near  Kato City
column5: Japan.------Hundreds of monks performed rites for the soul of whom the Japanese Buddhist sect called the “Living Heritage” of Cambodia.
